title: Advanced Biofuels and Bioproducts - James Weifu Lee
description:
Advanced Biofuels and Bioproducts - James Weifu Lee (Springer, 2013).pdf

ISBN 978-1-4614-3347-7

Designed as a text not only for students and researchers, but anyone interested in green technology, Advanced Biofuels and Bioproducts offers the reader a vast overview of the state-of-the-art in renewable energies. The typical chapter sets out to explain the fundamentals of a new technology as well as providing its context in the greater field. With contributions from nearly 100 leading researchers across the globe, the text serves as an important and timely look into this rapidly expanding field.
